item.title: R and Python Usage
item.description: Reticulate Have you ever wondered how to combine two coding languages? One easy way is to use reticulate. It lets R and Python to be used right from R markdown through separate R chunks and Python chunks! I have demonstrated a simple usage of the reticulate function in this blog post. The following image obtained from rstudio.github.io shows how R chunks differ from python chunks in R markdown (disregard the code).
